pages.title: Node Coloring
pages.text: Using $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l) on Pastel Network Nodes dyes them.$(br2)Each node will only be ablt to transfer items to nodes of the same color or ones it composites into, but not the other way around ($(c_cyan)Cyan$() nodes will transfer to $(c_blue)Blue$() ones, but not $(c_blue)Blue$() nodes to $(c_cyan)Cyan$()).
You can very finely adjust which Nodes can interact with others, allowing you to build complex transfer chains. $(bold)White$() nodes are only able to connect to other Whites.

pages.title: Spectral Colored Nodes
pages.text: Nodes colored with spectral pigment are able to interact with all nodes, regardless of their color.
Using a $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaid's Gem$(/l) on a Node will change it to a Fluid Node.$(br)It will transfer liquid instead of items.
